005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.TokenAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IBoundObject;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IMetaschemaData;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraint;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.AllowedValue;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.AllowedValues;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundFlag;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.MetaschemaAssembly;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.ValueConstraints;
017
018import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ReflectionToStringBuilder;
019import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
020
021@SuppressWarnings({
022    "PMD.DataClass",
023    "PMD.FieldNamingConventions"
024})
025@MetaschemaAssembly(
026    formalName = "Group As",
027    name = "group-as",
028    moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class)
029public class GroupingAs implements IBoundObject {
030  private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
031
032  @BoundFlag(
033      formalName = "Grouping Name",
034      name = "name",
035      required = true,
036      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class)
037  private String _name;
038
039  @BoundFlag(
040      formalName = "In JSON Grouping Syntax",
041      name = "in-json",
042      defaultValue = "SINGLETON_OR_ARRAY",
043      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class,
044      valueConstraints = @ValueConstraints(allowedValues = @AllowedValues(level = IConstraint.Level.ERROR, values = {
045          @AllowedValue(value = "ARRAY", description = "Always use an array."),
046          @AllowedValue(value = "SINGLETON_OR_ARRAY",
047              description = "Produce a singleton for a single member or an array for multiple members."),
048          @AllowedValue(value = "BY_KEY",
049              description = "For any group of one or more members, produce an object with properties for each member, using a designated flag for their property name values, which must be distinct.") })))
050  private String _inJson;
051
052  @BoundFlag(
053      formalName = "In XML Grouping Syntax",
054      name = "in-xml",
055      defaultValue = "UNGROUPED",
056      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class,
057      valueConstraints = @ValueConstraints(allowedValues = @AllowedValues(level = IConstraint.Level.ERROR,
058          values = { @AllowedValue(value = "GROUPED", description = "Use a wrapper element."),
059              @AllowedValue(value = "UNGROUPED", description = "Do not use a wrapper element.") })))
060  private String _inXml;
061
062  public GroupingAs() {
063    this(null);
064  }
065
066  public GroupingAs(IMetaschemaData data) {
067    this.__metaschemaData = data;
068  }
069
070  @Override
071  public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
072    return __metaschemaData;
073  }
074
075  public String getName() {
076    return _name;
077  }
078
079  public void setName(String value) {
080    _name = value;
081  }
082
083  public String getInJson() {
084    return _inJson;
085  }
086
087  public void setInJson(String value) {
088    _inJson = value;
089  }
090
091  public String getInXml() {
092    return _inXml;
093  }
094
095  public void setInXml(String value) {
096    _inXml = value;
097  }
098
099  @Override
100  public String toString() {
101    return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
102  }
103}
